caption.p: Biplots of the climate indices and berry quality traits along principal components 1 (F1) and principal components 2 (F2) for the white grape varieties (CH and GR) ( a); and component F1 and F3 for red grape varieties (CS, CF, M, S and A) ( b). CH, Chardonnay; GR, Grechetto; CS, Cabernet sauvignon; CF, C. franc; M, Merlot; S, Sangiovese; and A, Aleatico. Roman numerals represent the four quadrants of the Cartesian coordinate system.
